import '../styles/Profile.css' import like from '../assets/Icons/like.png' import dislike from '../assets/Icons/dislike.png' import { useState, useEffect, useRef, useCallback } from 'react' import {GetProfile,GetProfilePosts} from '../services/profiles.service' import {Comments} from './Comments' export const Profile = () =>{ const [isLoading, setLoading] = useState(false); const [profile, setProfileInfos] = useState([]); const [posts, setProfilePosts] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { GetProfile() .then(data => setProfileInfos(data)) .catch((err) => console.log(err)) }, []) useEffect(() => { GetProfilePosts() .then(data => setProfilePosts(data)) .catch((err) => console.log(err)) }, []) if (isLoading) { return

LOADING...

} console.log(profile); console.log(posts) return (

{profile.firstname} {profile.lastname}

{profile.description}

    {posts.map((post) =>

  • {post.userId}

    {post.content}

    {post.likes}

    {post.dislikes}

    comments
    handleSubmit(post._id,e)}>
    • )}
) }
